sentence.Network_en: I went through about four years of being addicted to video games.
sentence.Network_cn: 我大约有4年时间沉迷在电子游戏中。

sentence.Network_en: The key issue was whether the four defendants acted dishonestly.
sentence.Network_cn: 关键问题是4名被告是否存在欺诈行为。

sentence.Network_en: She denied the murder of four children who were in her care.
sentence.Network_cn: 她否认杀害了她所照管的4个孩子。

means.word_mean: 1. a game in which a pitcher allows the opposing team 4 hits
